alert.note: Alert for Creek; Osage; Pawnee; Tulsa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 7:30PM CDT until July 14 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Osage County in northeastern Oklahoma... Northern Creek County in northeastern Oklahoma... Southeastern Pawnee County in northeastern Oklahoma... West central Tulsa County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 730 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Osage, moving south at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Sand Springs... Sapulpa... Jenks... Cleveland... Mannford... Drumright... Kellyville... Oilton... Jennings... Westport... Osage... Hallett... Terlton... Shamrock... Maramec... Keystone State Park... Walnut Creek State Park... Silver City... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 198 and 216. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
